emuInput.TitMainTitle: Jacqueline Farrell and Michele Jones wearing "Bill Scranton" sashes, standing on either side of Robert Mosely or Mosley, in front of tiled wall at Republican rally at Civic Arena
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1962, pg. 18, reads: "Ike Drew the People, Their Attention, Cheers - Main speaker at the GOP rally last week was former President Eisenhower. For the occasion, a gala program was planned.  Among participants were, left photo, Robert Mosley, who sang the "Star Spangled Banner" and led the audience in Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.  He is flanked by two of the "Beauties for Scranton," Jacqueline Farrell, left and Michele Jones... - Harris Photos."
